DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Controlled Trial Comparing Intrathecal Morphine With Quadratus Lumborum Block Post-cesarean Delivery Analgesia
DOC.criteria: Nonemergent CD plan spinal anesthesia American Society Anesthesia physical status class I & II ; Age ≥18 year ; Term gestational age ( ≥37 week ) ; Singleton pregnancy ; Englishspeaking . Morbid Obesity ( BMI ≥35 kg/m2 ) ; Subjects significant obstetric neonatal comorbidities ; Patient enrollment another study involve medication within 30 day CD ; Any condition , may impair patient ability cooperate data collection ; Patient height less 152 cm ( 5 ' 0 '' ) ; History opioid tolerance sensitivity ; Intolerance nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) ; Women history illicit drug use prescribe opioids benzodiazepine .
